text.text: Being a licensed magic caster allows you to use your magical capabilities in public life.
You have long served as your queen's servant, but you feel that this party will be more than serving your queen.
Powerful magics are around you, and, for the first time, you feel like you're in presence of someone even more powerful than you.
☑️ TASK: Where is that damn Spellbook?
Find the spellbook you've accidentally dropped somewhere in the tavern.
It should contain three spells: Expelliarmus, Veritaserum Magicus and Imperio.
